definition: Zagreb, capital of Croatia 克羅地亞|克罗地亚[Ke4 luo2 di4 ya4]
square/frame/rule/(legal) case/style/character/standard/pattern/(grammar) case/(classical) to obstruct/to hinder/(classical) to arrive/to come/(classical) to investigate/to study exhaustively
to rein in/to compel/to force/to carve/to engrave/(literary) to command/to lead/bridle/(physics) abbr. for 勒克斯[le4 ke4 si1], lux
cloth/to declare/to announce/to spread/to make known

sentences.english: Composed on my flight from Chisinau to Zagreb via Frankfurt on July 25, 2002.
sentences.chinese: 年7月25日自基希納烏經法蘭克福飛薩格勒布途中。

sentences.english: Bjelovar in the capital city of Zagreb, about 60 kilometers east.
sentences.chinese: 別洛瓦爾市位於首都薩格勒布以東大約60公里處。

sentences.english: Vrapce is where Zagreb's mental hospital is located.
sentences.chinese: 烏拉普採是薩格勒布一家精神病院的所在地。
